results.name: Continued fraction of e+sqrt(e^2-1).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) default(realprecision, 100); contfrac(exp(1) + sqrt(exp(2) - 1)) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 01 2018
(MAGMA) SetDefaultRealField(RealField(100)); ContinuedFraction(Exp(1) + Sqrt(Exp(2) - 1)); // _G. C. Greubel_, Nov 01 2018
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Apr 11 2011
